meanings.definition: A loud, prolonged cry or howl.
meanings.sent1: The yowing of the coyotes echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The yowing of the baby kept the parents awake all night.
meanings.sent3: The yowing of the sirens signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent4: The yowing of the wind made the old house seem haunted.
meanings.sent5: The yowing of the crowd at the concert was deafening.
